commits.name: cart
commits.content:
{
	"name": "base-64",
	"version": "1.0.0",
	"description": "A robust base64 encoder/decoder that is fully compatible with `atob()` and `btoa()`, written in JavaScript.",
	"homepage": "https://mths.be/base64",
	"main": "base64.js",
	"keywords": [
		"codec",
		"decoder",
		"encoder",
		"base64",
		"atob",
		"btoa"
	],
	"license": "MIT",
	"author": {
		"name": "Mathias Bynens",
		"url": "https://mathiasbynens.be/"
	},
	"repository": {
		"type": "git",
		"url": "https://github.com/mathiasbynens/base64.git"
	},
	"bugs": "https://github.com/mathiasbynens/base64/issues",
	"files": [
		"LICENSE-MIT.txt",
		"base64.js"
	],
	"scripts": {
		"test": "mocha tests/tests.js",
		"build": "grunt build"
	},
	"devDependencies": {
		"coveralls": "^2.11.4",
		"grunt": "^0.4.5",
		"grunt-cli": "^1.3.2",
		"grunt-shell": "^1.1.2",
		"grunt-template": "^0.2.3",
		"istanbul": "^0.4.0",
		"mocha": "^6.2.0",
		"regenerate": "^1.2.1"
	}
}
